text: Xi'an-Yuxia Railwayï¼Œalso Xi'an-Huxian Railway.from Longhai railway Sanmincun Railway Station.go pass Lianhu,Weiyang,Yanta,Chang'an ,Huyi.Yuxia Railway Station is at the end of it. ==References== Category:Shaanxi Category:Rail transport in the People's Republic of China
